mapper.select: select l.PRODUCT_ID PRODUCT_ID, pi2.PRODUCT_IMAGE_FILE_NAME PRODUCT_IMAGE_FILE_NAME, p.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE PRODUCT_PRICE from love l join member m join product p join product_image pi2 on l.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID and l.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID and p.PRODUCT_ID = pi2.PRODUCT_IMAGE_FILE_NAME where m.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} and pi2.PRODUCT_IMAGE_TYPE = 'list' group by PRODUCT_ID order by PRODUCT_ID
